column4: Any way to enable desktop effects without installing the propriatery nvidia drivers? The nvidia drivers screw up my Office 2007 installation..
so im running without the nvidia drivers activated, but then things are a bit choppy as animations and such arent enabled
if you do not use the "nvidia" driver, then "nv" driver will likely be used. it has no 3d acceleration, afaik
yes, "vesa" and maybe more, but all without 3d support for proprietary nvidia cards
